entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @GOPLeader Americans starved for leadership & help and filled with hopelessness are returning to work to not lose jobs asshole! Still today because of you and the asshole you kiss in the WH there is no adequate covid-19 testing, tracing and isolation, no vacine or cure! Go to hell!
